channel.title: VB Help with HWID
channel.description:
How can I add a serial key, so when you press Buy it gives you a serial and only that serial will work once?
It is called a HWID
All I have is: [code] Public Class Form1 Dim a As String = HWID()
Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click If TextBox1.Text = a Then MsgBox("Welcome!") Else MsgBox("Wrong Code") End If
End Sub Function HWID() Dim hardwareID As String = System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent.User.Value Return hardwareID End Function
End Class [/code] What would I add to get this to give multiple options for a code, I was thinking about adding a .txt with serials in but I don`t know how to use it in VB and then add it to my file, please leave your Skypes below or add UmayrMir98 so we can talk.

item.title: VB Help with HWID
item.dc:creator: @dclawed dclawed
item.description:
@dclawed wrote:

How can I add a serial key, so when you press Buy it gives you a serial and only that serial will work once?

It is called a HWID

All I have is:

Public Class Form1
    Dim a As String = HWID()

    Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click
        If TextBox1.Text = a Then
            MsgBox("Welcome!")
        Else
            MsgBox("Wrong Code")
        End If

    End Sub
    Function HWID()
        Dim hardwareID As String = System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent.User.Value
        Return hardwareID
    End Function

End Class

What would I add to get this to give multiple options for a code, I was thinking about adding a .txt with serials in but I don`t know how to use it in VB and then add it to my file, please leave your Skypes below or add UmayrMir98 so we can talk.

Read full topic
